title: U.S. opinion poll : sexiest musical instrument 2014
summary: More than 26 % of Mexican internet users surveyed in 2014 claimed they used Guitar for finding dates .
Meanwhile , one out of four respondents cited Saxophone and 21 % of people surveyed mentioned Piano .
Sex and solitude Approximately 42.7 % of Mexicans who used musical instrument stated in 2017 that they did so in order to find friends .
gold: This statistic reveals the sexiest musical instrument according to adults in the United States in 2014.
During a survey , 26 percent of adults found the guitar to be the sexiest musical instrument to play .
